```{r}
#| label: binomial-demo
#| echo: true
#| code-fold: true
#| fig-align: center
k <- seq(0, 10)
prob <- dbinom(k, 10, 0.5)
bar_data <- tibble(k, prob)
ggplot(bar_data, aes(x=k, y=prob)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", fill=cbPalette[1]) +
  labs(
    title="Binomial Distribution, N = 10, p = 0.5",
    y="Probability Mass"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(0,10)) +
  dsan_theme("half")
```
